MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: C:\> F: F:\> mkdir \MongoData F:\> mkdir \MongoLogs
F:\> C: C:\> mongod --dbpath F:\MongoData\ --logpath F:\MongoLogs\mongolog.log
C:\> cd \my_mongo_dir\bin C:\my_mongo_dir\bin> mongo >db test > db.foo.insert( { a : 1 } ) > db.foo.find() { _id : ..., a : 1 } > show dbs ... > show collections ... > help
